screenTitle.pni:
Hi, we're Verti.
Who are you?
screenTitle.contactInfo: Where can we send your quote?

screenDesc.conatactInfo: By clicking ‘NEXT’, I consent to be contacted by Verti Insurance Company for insurance product advertisement, telemarketing and service purposes at the phone number and email address I have provided on this form. I agree that such contact may include: calls and text messages placed using an automated telephone dialing system; calls using artificial or pre-recorded voice; and/or email. I recognize that call, text, and data rates may apply depending on my carrier and plan. I understand that this consent is not a condition of purchase and that I can call Verti Insurance Company to discuss my insurance needs by calling the phone number at the top right corner of the screen.
